description: Retrieve the estimated number of people with hearing loss in the United Kingdom.
Identify which country has the highest estimated number of people with hearing loss.
Calculate the total estimated number of people with hearing loss in Europe* and the European Union.
Identify any country that has an unusually low estimated number of people with hearing loss compared to others.
Determine if there is a correlation between being part of the European Union and the estimated number of people with hearing loss.
Which countries have an estimated number of people with hearing loss greater than 50 million?
Rank the countries from the highest to the lowest estimated number of people with hearing loss.
What is the range of the estimated number of people with hearing loss across all countries?
Identify what percentage of the countries have an estimated number of people with hearing loss above 10 million.
Identify clusters of countries with similar estimated numbers of people with hearing loss.
